level.heading: Coverage.
level.text: If coverage to the small or large employer market pursuant to this subchapter ceases to be written, administered, or otherwise provided, such coverage shall continue to be governed by this subchapter with respect to business conducted under this subchapter that was transacted prior to the effective date of termination and that remains in force.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-3301.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-209
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-209, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-3301.01.
